definition: lower chamber (of legislative body)/lower house/the House of Commons
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: The 435 members of the House are elected every two years.
sentences.chinese: 最少每五年举行一次普选来选举下议院议员。

sentences.english: The House (ie Members of the House of Commons) rose at 10 pm.
sentences.chinese: 下议院已于晚上10点钟散会。

sentences.english: She was the first woman from Quebec elected to the House of Commons.
sentences.chinese: 她是魁北克当选为下议院议员的第一名妇女。

sentences.english: When the Senate passed the bill in September, it achieved a veto-proof majority.
sentences.chinese: 当下议院在九月份通过提案时，就满足了反对的条件。

sentences.english: In the house of commons the most devastating weapon is ridicule .
sentences.chinese: 在下议院，最历害的武器就是嘲笑。

sentences.english: From being a librarian she is now an MP.
sentences.chinese: 她从一个图书馆管理员当上了目前的下议院议员。

sentences.english: Nearly half of the party's 308 lower-house members are new in national politics.
sentences.chinese: 该党308名下议院议员将近一半是政治新手。

sentences.english: The pleasure of leading the ragtag and bobtail proves but so-so, compared with the pleasure of commanding the House of Commons.
sentences.chinese: 领导下层群众的乐趣远不及在下议院中当领袖的快乐。

sentences.english: The flower show was judged by the local MP.
sentences.chinese: 花卉展览由当地的下议院议员担任评判。

sentences.english: The visitor's gallery in the House of Commons was full.
sentences.chinese: 下议院的旁听席上坐满了人。

sentences.english: Great Britain that are reserved for ministers or ex-ministers.
sentences.chinese: 英国下议院中前排的座位，是留给部长大臣的。

sentences.english: There was an angry scene when the report was presented to the Parliament .
sentences.chinese: 当这个报告呈送到下议院时，出现一片争吵的场面。

sentences.english: Mr. Smith thanked him and they started to walk there.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯先生向他道了谢，他们就开始向下议院走去。

sentences.english: Several labour mps break away to join the social democrats.
sentences.chinese: 有些工党下议院议员脱党后加入社会民主党。

sentences.english: House of Commons consisted of 658 members.
sentences.chinese: 下议院由六百五十八名议员组成。

sentences.english: Several Labour MPs broke away to join the Social Democrats.
sentences.chinese: 有些工党下议院议员脱党后加入社会民主党。

definition: seat in a parliament or legislative assembly
lower house of bicameral assembly/House of Representatives (USA)/Chamber of Deputies
